messages.messageBody:
> From: LOWRIEK@...
> > Wondering if you have you ever listened to Viggo Mortensen reading his
own
> > poetry??? Yummy. And so much better than that boring old professor in my
> > English Lit class ;-)
> >
>
> Ok where do I sign up for this??????? Is this on tape, on video(Oh please
> please)
> where do is see it or hear it,Robyn??
> Nancy, drooling in BC

There's samples here, and you can order the CD's. One spoken word CD also
comes with one of his books of photography (he has several books of his
paintings and photos out). I like his poetry a lot and the photos, but the
paintings aren't my cup of tea.

http://specialrealms.com/VM/poetry.html

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
